AssessmentBasis.description: Basis on which an EYA or WRA component has been assessed.
AssessmentBasis.title: AssessmentBasis

AssessmentProcessDescription.description: Description of a process used in an energy yield assessment.

comments.description: Optional comments on the plant performance loss subcategory.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Description of the assessment process or model.
description.title: Description

label.description: Label or name of the process or model.
label.title: Label

AssessmentProcessDescription.title: AssessmentProcessDescription

annual_energy_production.description: Annual energy production estimates in GWh.
annual_energy_production.title: Annual Energy Production

Location.description: Specification of a horizontal location in space.
Location.title: Location

OperationalRestriction.description: Specifications of a restriction that limits power output. In the current draft of the schema, 'label', 'description' and 'comments' fields are available to describe the restriction with free text. This is intended to be expanded into a more comprehensive data model.

comments.description: Optional comments on the operational restriction.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the operational restriction.
description.title: Description

label.description: Short label to indicate the type of operational restriction.
label.title: Label

OperationalRestriction.title: OperationalRestriction

Organisation.description: Issuing or receiving organisation of an energy yield assessment.

examples: 5 Munro Road, Summit Centre, Sgurrsville, G12 0YE, UK
address.title: Address

contact_name.description: Name(s) of contact person(s) in the organisation.
contact_name.title: Contact Name

Organisation.title: Organisation

efficiency.description: Dimensionless plant performance efficiency (loss factor) results.
efficiency.title: Efficiency

Result.description: Collection of results a quantity along specific dimensions.

anyOf.description: Period of or in time that a set of results are applicable.
anyOf.title: Assessment Period

assessment_period.description: Period of or in time that has been assessed and for which the results are applicable.

comments.description: Optional comments on the result.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the result.
description.title: Description

items.description: Dimension along which results are assigned.
items.title: Results Dimension

dimensions.description: Dimensions along which the results are binned (all result values in the same results object must have the same dimensions).
dimensions.title: Dimensions

statistics.description: List of result statistic objects that each include result values for a specific statistic type.

items.description: Result values for one specific statistic type.

comments.description: Optional comments on the result statistic.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the result statistic.
description.title: Description

statistic_type.description: Type of statistic in the results component.

values.description: Result as a single number or values at coordinates.
values.title: Values

items.title: Result Statistic

statistics.title: Statistics

Result.title: Result

StatisticType.description: Type of statistical measure or parameter reported in a result.
StatisticType.title: StatisticType

TimeVariabilityType.description: Type of time variability considered for an assessment element.
TimeVariabilityType.title: TimeVariabilityType

relative_energy_uncertainty.description: Uncertainty assessment results as dimensionless relative values expressed in terms of AEP (annual energy production) and calculated as the standard deviation of the energy uncertainty distribution divided by the net P50 (50% probability of exceedance level) AEP.
relative_energy_uncertainty.title: Relative Energy Uncertainty

relative_wind_speed_uncertainty.description: Uncertainty assessment results as dimensionless relative values expressed in terms of wind speed and calculated as the standard deviation of the wind speed uncertainty distribution divided by the mean wind speed.
relative_wind_speed_uncertainty.title: Relative Wind Speed Uncertainty

description: IEC 61400-15-2 EYA DEF top-level data model.

$id.description: URI of the EYA DEF JSON document, which should have the field name '$id' in the JSON document.
$id.title: URI

$schema.description: URI of the EYA DEF JSON Schema, which should have the field name '$schema' in the JSON document. It is assumed to be the latest published version if not included.
$schema.title: EYA DEF JSON Schema URI

comments.description: Optional comments on the energy yield assessment (EYA) report.
examples: Report labelled as draft. To be finalised following review by all parties.
comments.title: Comments

confidentiality_classification.description: Confidentiality classification of the report document, if relevant.
confidentiality_classification.title: Confidentiality Classification

contract_reference.description: Reference to contract between the issuing and receiving organisations that governs the energy yield assessment (EYA) report document, if relevant.
contract_reference.title: Contract Reference

contributors.description: List of report contributors (e.g. author and verifier)

items.description: Contributor to an energy yield assessment.
items.title: Report Contributor

contributors.title: Contributors

description.description: Optional description of the energy yield assessment (EYA) report.
examples: An updated document to incorporate the latest measurement data.
description.title: Description

document_id.description: The ID of the report document; not including the version when 'document_version' is used. This will typically follow the convention of the document management system of the issuing organisation(s).
document_id.title: Document ID

document_version.description: Version of the report document, also known as revision. As with the 'document_id', this will typically follow the document versioning convention of the document management system of the issuing organisation(s).
document_version.title: Document Version

epsg_srid.description: EPSG Spatial Reference System Identifier (SRID) for the Coordinate Reference System (CRS) used for all spatial data (e.g. turbine locations) in the EYA DEF JSON document. All location coordinates must be reported in the same CRS, which must be one that has an EPSG code. If different CRSs are used the data must be converted to be consistent with the EPSG code specified here.
epsg_srid.title: Epsg Srid

issue_date.description: Report issue date in the ISO 8601 standard format for a calendar date, i.e. YYYY-MM-DD.
issue_date.title: Issue Date

issuing_organisations.description: The organisation(s) issuing the report (e.g. consultant).
issuing_organisations.title: Issuing Organisations

items.description: A measurement metadata JSON document according to the IEA Task 43 WRA Data Model.
items.title: Measurement Station Metadata

measurement_stations.description: List of measurement station metadata documents according to the IEA Wind Task 43 WRA Data Model, including all measurement stations relevant to the EYA, if any. It is recommended that one metadata document be completed for each measurement station, although the WRA Data Model allows for grouping multiple measurement stations into a single document.
measurement_stations.title: Measurement Stations

project_country.description: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 two-letter code of the country where the project under assessment is located.
project_country.title: Alpha2 Country Code

project_name.description: Name of the project under assessment.
project_name.title: Project Name

receiving_organisations.description: The organisation(s) receiving the report (e.g. client), if relevant.
receiving_organisations.title: Receiving Organisations

items.description: Metadata for a reference meteorological dataset. The schema describes a dataset at a single horizontal spatial location. Separate data model instances need to be used to describe data at different location from the same source dataset (e.g. different grid cells from a reanalysis dataset).

comments.description: Optional comments on the meteorological dataset.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Description of the meteorological dataset.
description.title: Description

id.description: Unique ID for the reference meteorological dataset within the EYA DEF document.
id.title: Id

location.description: The horizontal spatial location of the meteorological data.

items.title: Reference Meteorological Dataset

reference_meteorological_datasets.description: List of metadata documents for reference meteorological datasets used in the long-term prediction process of the EYA, which may include details of for example ground-based meteorological stations, reanalysis datasets and mesoscale model datasets used as long-termreferences.
reference_meteorological_datasets.title: Reference Meteorological Datasets

comments.description: Optional comments on the reference wind farm.
comments.title: Comments

datasets.description: List of metadata documents describing the operational datasets from the reference wind farm that were used in the EYA.

comments.description: Optional comments on the dataset.
comments.title: Comments

data_period_end_date.description: End of the data period in the ISO 8601 standard format for a calendar date, i.e. YYYY-MM-DD.
data_period_end_date.title: Data Period End Date

data_period_start_date.description: Start of the data period in the ISO 8601 standard format for a calendar date, i.e. YYYY-MM-DD.
data_period_start_date.title: Data Period Start Date

data_source_type.description: The type of the operational data source. Primary data, such as primary SCADA data, comes directly from the source without processing. Report data refers to data extracted from report document, such as monthly operational reports. Other secondary data comprises all other data source categories, such as secondary SCADA data provided in processed (harmonised) form by a data management service provider.
data_source_type.title: Data Source Type

data_supplier_organisation.description: The organisation that supplied the data.

data_type.description: The type of data in the operational data, categorised as 'scada' for data from a Supervisory Control and Data Acquisition (SCADA) system, 'metered' for data from a production meter, 'environmental_measurement' for data from an (on-site) environmental measurement station such as a meteorological mast or a remote sensing device (RSD) and 'other' for any other type of unit.
data_type.title: Operational Data Type

description.description: Optional description of the dataset.
description.title: Description

label.description: Label of the reference wind farm dataset.
label.title: Label

used_data_variables.description: A list of the types of data variables included in this dataset and used in the assessment. For a large dataset (such as a full wind turbine SCADA dataset) this field should not include all the variables but only the ones that were used in the analysis.

items.description: Reference wind farm operational data variable.

comments.description: Optional comments on the data variable.
comments.title: Comments

data_level.description: Whether the operational data variable is provided for each individual wind turbine ('turbine_level'), is aggregated at the wind farm level ('wind_farm_level') or corresponds to a different ('other') unit such as an environmental measurement station.
data_level.title: Operational Data Level

description.description: Optional description of the data variable.
description.title: Description

label.description: Label of the data variable. This is currently free text but should be replaced by a list of enum options.
label.title: Label

measurement_point.description: Optional clarification of the point of measurement, such as the location of the energy meter for metered production.
examples: Energy meter at point of common coupling with the grid
Low voltage (LV) side of wind turbine transformer
measurement_point.title: Measurement Point

raw_data_recovery_rate.description: Dimensionless raw data recovery rate for the variable.
raw_data_recovery_rate.title: Raw Data Recovery Rate

statistic_types.description: A list of the types of statistics included for this data variable.
statistic_types.title: Statistic Types

items.title: Reference Wind Farm Data Variable

used_data_variables.title: Used Data Variables

datasets.title: Datasets

description.description: Optional description of the reference wind farm.
description.title: Description

id.description: Unique ID for the reference wind farm within the EYA DEF document.
id.title: Id

wind_farm_id.description: The ID of the wind farm in the 'wind_farms' section of the top-level of the EYA DEF document, containing the configuration data for the reference wind farm.
wind_farm_id.title: Wind Farm Id

reference_wind_farms.description: List of metadata documents for the reference operational wind farms relevant to the EYA, if any. One metadata document shall be completed for each relevant reference operational wind farm.
reference_wind_farms.title: Reference Wind Farms

items.description: Single unique energy yield assessment scenario.

comments.description: Optional comments on the scenario.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the scenario.
description.title: Description

energy_assessment.description: Energy assessment details and results, including gross energy, plant performance, net energy and uncertainties.

gross_energy_assessment.description: Details and results for the assessment of gross energy yield.

process_description.description: Specification of the process used to calculate the gross EYA estimates.

gross_energy_assessment.title: Gross Energy Assessment

net_energy_assessment.description: Details and results for the assessment of net energy yield.

process_description.description: Specification of the process used to calculate the net EYA estimates.

results.description: Net EYA predictions, including central estimates, overall uncertainties and results at different confidence levels.

net_energy_assessment.title: Net Energy Assessment

plant_performance_assessment.description: Plant performance loss assessment categories including results.

categories.description: Plant performance loss assessment categories including results.

comments.description: Optional comments on the plant performance loss category.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the plant performance loss category.
description.title: Description

label.description: Label of the plant performance loss category.
label.title: Plant Performance Category Label

subcategories.description: Plant performance loss assessment subcategories that fall under the category. The subcategory objects include details and results at the subcategory level.

assessment_process_descriptions.description: Description of calculation processes used in the assessment of the plant performance loss subcategory.
assessment_process_descriptions.title: Assessment Process Descriptions

basis.description: Basis of plant performance loss subcategory assessment. The basis describes the level of detail of the calculation or estimate used in the assessment of the subcategory.

comments.description: Optional comments on the plant performance loss subcategory.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the plant performance loss subcategory.
description.title: Description

items.description: Plant performance loss assessment subcategory element.

assessment_process_descriptions.description: Description of calculation processes used in the assessment of the plant performance loss subcategory element.
assessment_process_descriptions.title: Assessment Process Descriptions

basis.description: Basis of plant performance loss subcategory element assessment. The basis describes the level of detail of the calculation or estimate used in the assessment of the element.

comments.description: Optional comments on the plant performance loss subcategory element.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the plant performance loss subcategory element.
description.title: Description

is_independent.description: Whether the plant performance loss subcategory element is independent of all other elements.
is_independent.title: Is Independent

label.description: Label of the plant performance loss subcategory element.
label.title: Label

results.description: Plant performance assessment subcategory element results.

variability.description: Considered variability in the plant performance loss subcategory element.

items.title: Plant Performance Subcategory Element

elements.description: Plant performance loss assessment elements that fall under the subcategory. The element objects include details and results at the element level. A breakdown of plant performance loss subcategories into elements is optional and can be included only for a subset of the subcategories, as relevant. Whereas the categories and subcategories are fixed, the user may freely define element labels.
elements.title: Elements

label.description: Label of the plant performance loss subcategory.
label.title: Plant Performance Subcategory Label

variability.description: Considered variability in the plant performance loss subcategory.

subcategories.title: Subcategories

categories.title: Categories

results.description: Overall plant performance loss assessment results.

plant_performance_assessment.title: Plant Performance Assessment

energy_assessment.title: Energy Assessment

id.description: Optional unique identifier of the scenario.
id.title: Id

is_main_scenario.description: Whether or not this is the main scenario in the report.
is_main_scenario.title: Is Main Scenario

operational_lifetime_length_years.description: Number of years of project operational lifetime.
operational_lifetime_length_years.title: Operational Lifetime Length Years

turbine_wind_resource_assessment.description: Wind resource assessment at the turbine locations.

comments.description: Optional comments on the turbine wind resource assessment.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the turbine wind resource assessment.
description.title: Description

results.description: Results of the wind resource assessment at the turbine location(s).

air_density.description: Final long-term air density estimates at the turbine location(s) in kilogram per cubic metre.
air_density.title: Air Density

probability.description: Final long-term probability distribution estimates at the turbine location(s), such as wind speed probability distributions or joint wind speed and direction frequency distributions, as dimensionless values.
probability.title: Probability

temperature.description: Final long-term temperature estimates at the turbine location(s) in degree C.
temperature.title: Temperature

turbulence_intensity.description: Final long-term turbulence intensity estimates at the turbine location(s) as dimensionless values.
turbulence_intensity.title: Turbulence Intensity

wind_shear_exponent.description: Final long-term power law wind shear exponent estimates at the turbine location(s).
wind_shear_exponent.title: Wind Shear Exponent

wind_speed.description: Final long-term wind speed estimates at the turbine location(s) in metre per second.
wind_speed.title: Wind Speed

results.title: Turbine Wind Resource Results

wind_resource_assessment_id_reference.description: The ID of the wind resource assessment on which the turbine wind resource assessment is based. This must refer to an ID of a wind resource assessment included at the top level of the EYA DEF. The schema requires that a turbine wind resource assessment is based on only one wind resource assessment.
wind_resource_assessment_id_reference.title: Wind Resource Assessment Id Reference

wind_spatial_modelling_processes.description: Wind spatial modelling processes used in the assessment.
wind_spatial_modelling_processes.title: Wind Spatial Modelling Processes

wind_uncertainty_assessment.description: Wind related uncertainty assessment categories including results.

categories.description: Wind related uncertainty assessment categories including results.

items.description: Category of a wind related uncertainty assessment.

comments.description: Optional comments on the wind related uncertainty category.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the wind related uncertainty category.
description.title: Description

label.description: Label of the wind related uncertainty assessment category.
label.title: Wind Uncertainty Category Label

results.description: Wind related uncertainty assessment category results.

subcategories.description: Wind related uncertainty assessment subcategories that fall under the category. The subcategory objects include details and results at the subcategory level.

items.description: Subcategory of a wind related uncertainty assessment.

comments.description: Optional comments on the wind related uncertainty subcategory.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the wind related uncertainty subcategory.
description.title: Description

items.description: Subcategory element of a wind related uncertainty assessment.

comments.description: Optional comments on the wind related uncertainty subcategory element.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the wind related uncertainty subcategory element.
description.title: Description

label.description: Label of the wind related uncertainty subcategory element.
label.title: Label

results.description: Wind related uncertainty assessment subcategory element results.

items.title: Wind Uncertainty Subcategory Element

elements.description: Wind related uncertainty assessment elements that fall under the subcategory. The element objects include details and results at the element level. A breakdown of wind related uncertainty subcategories into elements is optional and can be included only for a subset of the subcategories, as relevant. Whereas the categories and subcategories are fixed, the user may freely define element labels.
elements.title: Elements

label.description: Label of the wind related uncertainty subcategory.
label.title: Wind Uncertainty Subcategory Label

results.description: Wind related uncertainty assessment subcategory results.

items.title: Wind Uncertainty Subcategory

subcategories.title: Subcategories

items.title: Wind Uncertainty Category

categories.title: Categories

results.description: Overall wind related uncertainty assessment results.

wind_uncertainty_assessment.title: Wind Uncertainty Assessment

turbine_wind_resource_assessment.title: Turbine Wind Resource Assessment

wind_farm_ids.description: List of the IDs for all wind farms included in the scenario.
wind_farm_ids.title: Wind Farm Ids

items.title: Scenario

scenarios.description: List of energy yield assessment scenarios.
scenarios.title: Scenarios

title.description: Title of the energy yield assessment (EYA) report.
examples: Energy yield assessment of the Barefoot Wind Farm
title.title: Title

items.description: Wind turbine performance specifications according to the IEC-61400-16 data model.
items.title: Turbine Model Specifications

turbine_models.description: List of wind turbine model specifications.
turbine_models.title: Turbine Models

uuid.description: UUID of the EYA DEF JSON document.
uuid.title: UUID

wind_farms.description: List of all wind farms considered in the EYA. This should comprise internal, external and future wind farms, including those used as reference wind farms in the wind resource assessment, if any. If different configurations are assessed for one or more internal and/or future wind farms in different scenarios, a wind farm object must be completed for each unique configuration, with the relevant configurations for each scenario referenced by wind farm ID.

items.description: A collection of wind turbines considered as one unit (plant).

abbreviation.description: Optional abbreviated label of the wind farm.
abbreviation.title: Abbreviation

comments.description: Optional comments on the wind farm.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the wind farm.
description.title: Description

export_capacity.description: The maximum permanently transmittable power (in MW) from the wind farm at the grid connection, or equivalent.
export_capacity.title: Export Capacity

id.description: Unique identifier of the wind farm.
id.title: Id

installed_capacity.description: The maximum production (in MW) of the wind farm under typical conditions. If there are features in place to increase power output beyond the stated nameplate power of the turbines (e.g. so-called power boost solutions), the wind farm installed capacity should correspond to that increased power, insofar as is reached under typical conditions and not only in rare exceptions.
installed_capacity.title: Installed Capacity

label.description: Label or name of the wind farm.
label.title: Label

operational_lifetime_end_date.description: Operational lifetime end date of the wind farm (format YYYY-MM-DD).
operational_lifetime_end_date.title: Operational Lifetime End Date

operational_lifetime_start_date.description: Operational lifetime start date of the wind farm (format YYYY-MM-DD).
operational_lifetime_start_date.title: Operational Lifetime Start Date

relevance.description: The relevance of the wind farm for the assessment ('internal', 'external' or 'future').
relevance.title: Wind Farm Relevance

restrictions.description: List of operational restrictions at the wind farm level.
restrictions.title: Restrictions

turbines.description: List of specifications for constituent turbines.

items.description: Specification of all details for a turbine configuration.

comments.description: Optional comments on the turbine.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the turbine.
description.title: Description

ground_level_altitude.description: The ground level altitude (base elevation) of the turbine (in m).
ground_level_altitude.title: Ground Level Altitude

hub_height.description: The hub height of the turbine (in m).
hub_height.title: Hub Height

label.description: Label of the turbine, if different from the 'id'.
label.title: Label

location.description: The horizontal spatial location of the turbine.

operational_lifetime_end_date.description: Operational lifetime end date of the individual turbine (format YYYY-MM-DD).
operational_lifetime_end_date.title: Operational Lifetime End Date

operational_lifetime_start_date.description: Operational lifetime start date of the individual turbine (format YYYY-MM-DD).
operational_lifetime_start_date.title: Operational Lifetime Start Date

restrictions.description: List of operational restrictions at the turbine level.
restrictions.title: Restrictions

turbine_model_id.description: Unique identifier of the turbine model.
turbine_model_id.title: Turbine Model Id

items.title: Turbine Configuration

turbines.title: Turbines

items.title: Wind Farm Configuration

wind_farms.title: Wind Farms

wind_resource_assessments.description: List of wind resource assessments, including results, at the measurement station locations.

items.description: Wind resource assessment at the measurement location(s).

comments.description: Optional comments on the wind resource assessment.
comments.title: Comments

description.description: Optional description of the wind resource assessment.
description.title: Description

results.description: Results of the wind resource assessment at the measurement location(s).

air_density.description: Final long-term air density estimates at the measurement location(s) in kilogram per cubic metre.
air_density.title: Air Density

probability.description: Final long-term probability distribution estimates at the measurement location(s), such as wind speed probability distributions or joint wind speed and direction frequency distributions, as dimensionless values.
probability.title: Probability

temperature.description: Final long-term temperature estimates at the measurement location(s) in degree C.
temperature.title: Temperature

turbulence_intensity.description: Final long-term turbulence intensity estimates at the measurement location(s) as dimensionless values.
turbulence_intensity.title: Turbulence Intensity

wind_shear_exponent.description: Final long-term power law wind shear exponent estimates at the measurement location(s).
wind_shear_exponent.title: Wind Shear Exponent

wind_speed.description: Final long-term wind speed estimates at the measurement location(s)in metre per second.
wind_speed.title: Wind Speed

results.title: Wind Resource Results

wind_resource_assessment_id.description: Unique ID of the wind resource assessment within the EYA DEF document.
wind_resource_assessment_id.title: Wind Resource Assessment Id

items.title: Wind Resource Assessment

wind_resource_assessments.title: Wind Resource Assessments

title: IEC 61400-15-2 EYA DEF Schema
